title: How to Cheat on Scary Maze

steps.headline: Go to the Scary Maze game.
steps.description: Search for it! The game's interface will look like a mint green maze in a black background with a blue dot.

steps.headline: When you reach to the 3rd level, drag the blue dot to the red rectangular door, then wait for the scary face and the scream to come up!

text: Blue Dot Go to the Scary Maze game. Search for it! The game's interface will look like a mint green maze in a black background with a blue dot. When you reach to the 3rd level, drag the blue dot to the red rectangular door, then wait for the scary face and the scream to come up!  Red Zone Right click.  Click on the red zone.  Repeat for another scare.
